descriptionHtml:
[center][color=#93c47d][size=6][b][i]Unique Grasses and Groundcovers Plugin[/i][/b][/size][/color][/center]
[center][b][i][color=#ff7700][size=4]+++ What this MOD +++[/size][/color][/i][/b]
This MOD is Small plugin for Unique Grasses and Groundcovers.
Unique Grasses and Groundcovers has lot of resources but this mod have so many unused grasses.
I edited his esp file to added these unused grasses. I added these grasses instead of vanilla grass.
Grass density was increased. You need high spec machine I guess.[/center]
[color=#ff7700]
[/color][center][color=#ff7700][i][b][size=4]+++ Installation +++[/size][/b][/i][/color]
1, [color=red]"Unique Grasses and Groundcovers" is absolutely necessary for this Mod.[/color] Please Install this awesome MOD from below link.
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42370]Unique Grasses and Groundcovers - Nature and Landscape Enhancement by Josh Ezzell[/url]
2, Install Unique Grasses and Groundcovers.
3, Install this plugin.
4, Uncheck "unique grasses.esp" and check "UGCustum.esp" with SkyrimLauncher.
5, Enjoy![/center]
[center][color=#ff7700]
[i][b][size=4]+++Performance+++[/size][/b][/i]
[color=#ffffff]You can adjust grass density.
Open your skyrim.ini and edit grass section.
[Grass]
iMinGrassSize=35 ... (20 is most heavy. but it looks so dense grass. I recommend to 30~50)[/color][/color][/center]

[center][i][b][color=#ff7700][size=4]+++ Permission +++[/size][/color][/b][/i]
Original creator Josh Ezzell admitted my work.
He says "Thank you for taking the time to do that for people".

Do not upload to Steam Workshop.[/center][color=#ff7700][size=4][i][b]
[/b][/i][/size][/color][center][color=#ff7700][size=4][i][b]+++ Credit +++[/b][/i][/size][/color]
Josh Ezzell
tamu75[/center]
[center][i][b][color=#ff7700][size=4]+++ Unique Grasses and Groundcovers Credit +++[/size][/color][/b][/i]
Josh Ezzell for Creator of Unique Grasses and Groundcovers
Elinen for the grass resources - Hoddminir Grass, Spring Flowers I, and Spring Flowers II.
SparrowPrince for the lush grass models, for lots of advice, help with the installer and generally being awesome.
Kyokushinoyama for mod images.
anaphiel for mod images.
Vurt for allowing me to use some of his textures as assets for my own.[/center]
[center][b][i][color=#ff7700][size=4]
+++ See also : This is My ENB +++[/size][/color][/i][/b]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/49547]TK ENB[/url][/center]
author: tamu75
